post.body: really?! I seen them supporting glasvegas and just thought they sounded like typical killers/kaisers stuff.
I vote blonde.
Indeed it was rather excellent.
Just stood for near 20 minutes in the icy cold waiting for a connecting train. Cuz THAT will help my cold...
Back from university again, getting ready to rest in bed again - once I setup my new Logitech Harmony remote that is!
My God I do hate being ill.
Off to bed with all the meds I could possibly take. Hoping for an overnight miracle - not likely though.
Dosing on Beechams Cold & Flu: Blackcurrant. Beats Lemsip on taste thats for sure.
Feeling extremely ill. My nose and ears are bunged.
Unfortunately I'm currently suffering badly with a head cold. Me = miserable.
Just spent the night in an awesome hotel room for the huge sum of £1. God bless insanely stupid sales.
For those in the UK who enjoy listening to music easily (legal streams of almost everything) check out Spotify - http://is.gd/eufI
Successfully used the Twilight hack to install homebrew on the Wii. Now to see what cool things are out there.
Argh, I've finally got the sickness off everyone else after doing so well not to get it. Bugger.
Watching Legend Hunters. "Alien abductees" are all freakin' loony.
Tidying up, and somehow going to have to find time to do some work.
Very much suffering for last night. Worth it though. All £100 worth of the food/drink I bought is pretty much gone.
All preparations for tonight's party are done. Just hoping it all goes well!
Playing some Mirrors Edge. Not helping my headache! But thankfully its slowly going away.
Ok, not in the right mood for Tron, change of plan to Amelie. Heard great things about this.
